languages.text: "Мы где-то виделись?.." {n}Женщина одаривает вас хмельным взглядом — две пустые бутылки уже составили ей компанию перед вашим приходом. В грязном и дымном баре она выглядит совершенно инородно: вычурный наряд, многочисленные украшения, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} с покрытием из драгоценных металлов — все в этом человеке кричит о богатстве и дерзости, необходимой для столь откровенной демонстрации роскоши.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мы где-то виделись?.." {n}Брюнетка одаривает вас хмельным взглядом — две пустые бутылки уже составили ей компанию перед вашим приходом. В грязном и дымном баре она выглядит совершенно инородно: вычурный наряд, многочисленные украшения, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} с покрытием из драгоценных металлов — все в этом человеке кричит о богатстве и дерзости, необходимой для столь откровенной демонстрации роскоши.{/n}

languages.text: "Have we met somewhere before?" {n}The woman looks at you with the glassy eyes of a drunk, and you notice the two empty bottles that had been keeping her company before you arrived. She looks completely out of place in this dingy, smoky bar. The fancy attire, the abundance of jewellery, the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} plated with precious metals — her appearance not only screams wealth, but also audacity, for only an audacious person would flaunt their wealth in a place like this.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы где-то виделись?.." {n}Женщина одаривает вас хмельным взглядом — две пустые бутылки уже составили ей компанию перед вашим приходом. В грязном и дымном баре она выглядит совершенно инородно: вычурный наряд, многочисленные украшения, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} с покрытием из драгоценных металлов — все в этом человеке кричит о богатстве и дерзости, необходимой для столь откровенной демонстрации роскоши.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Have we met somewhere before?" {n}The brunette gives you an inebriated look — two empty bottles had kept her company before you arrived. She looks completely out of place in this dingy, smoky bar. The fancy attire, the abundance of jewelry, the implants plated with precious metals — everything in this person screams wealth and audacity, a quality required for such a blatant show of luxury.{/n}

The fancy attire, the abundance of jewelry, the implants plated with precious metals — everything in this person screams wealth and audacity, a quality required for such a blatant show of luxury.{/n}

languages.text: 「どこかで会ったかい？」{n}女性が、酔っ払い特有のうつろな目でこちらを見つめてきた。彼女の横には2本の空のボトルが置かれている。薄暗い、煙の立ち込めるバーにはまったく似つかわしくない風貌だ。洒落た服装に数々の宝石を身につけ、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}は貴金属でメッキされている。外見からは金持ちなだけでなく、大胆な人間であることが伺える。なぜなら、図太い者しかこんな場所でそのような格好をすることはできない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we met somewhere before?" {n}The woman looks at you with the glassy eyes of a drunk, and you notice the two empty bottles that had been keeping her company before you arrived. She looks completely out of place in this dingy, smoky bar. The fancy attire, the abundance of jewellery, the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} plated with precious metals — her appearance not only screams wealth, but also audacity, for only an audacious person would flaunt their wealth in a place like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「どこかで会ったかい？」{n}女性が、酔っ払い特有のうつろな目でこちらを見つめてきた。彼女の横には2本の空のボトルが置かれている。薄暗い、煙の立ち込めるバーにはまったく似つかわしくない風貌だ。洒落た服装に数々の宝石を身につけ、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}は貴金属でメッキされている。外見からは金持ちなだけでなく、大胆な人間であることが伺える。なぜなら、図太い者しかこんな場所でそのような格好をすることはできない。{/n}

languages.text: “我们之前见过面吗？”{n}这位女子醉眼朦胧地看着你。你注意到，在你来之前，她身边就已经摆着两个空酒瓶了。她在这间烟雾缭绕的昏暗酒吧里显得格格不入。华丽的衣饰、夺目的珠宝、贵重金属制成的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}——她看起来不仅富可敌国，更是胆大包天。只有胆大包天的人，才会在这样的地方炫耀自己的财富。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we met somewhere before?" {n}The woman looks at you with the glassy eyes of a drunk, and you notice the two empty bottles that had been keeping her company before you arrived. She looks completely out of place in this dingy, smoky bar. The fancy attire, the abundance of jewellery, the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} plated with precious metals — her appearance not only screams wealth, but also audacity, for only an audacious person would flaunt their wealth in a place like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们之前见过面吗？”{n}这位深色肌肤的女子醉眼朦胧地看着你。你注意到，在你来之前，她身边就已经摆着两个空酒瓶了。她在这间烟雾缭绕的昏暗酒吧里显得格格不入。华丽的衣饰、夺目的珠宝、贵重金属制成的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}——她看起来不仅富可敌国，更是胆大包天。只有胆大包天的人，才会在这样的地方炫耀自己的财富。{/n}

languages.text: « On se connaît ? » {n}Ivre, la femme vous regarde de ses yeux vitreux, et vous remarquez la présence de deux bouteilles vides qui lui tenaient compagnie avant votre arrivée. Elle ne semble absolument pas à sa place dans ce bar miteux et enfumé. Entre ses vêtements de luxe, ses nombreux bijoux et ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} plaqués de métaux précieux, toute son apparence évoque non seulement une certaine richesse, mais aussi l'audace nécessaire pour afficher sa fortune dans un endroit pareil.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we met somewhere before?" {n}The woman looks at you with the glassy eyes of a drunk, and you notice the two empty bottles that had been keeping her company before you arrived. She looks completely out of place in this dingy, smoky bar. The fancy attire, the abundance of jewellery, the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} plated with precious metals — her appearance not only screams wealth, but also audacity, for only an audacious person would flaunt their wealth in a place like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « On se connaît ? » {n}Ivre, la femme aux cheveux bruns vous regarde de ses yeux vitreux, et vous remarquez la présence de deux bouteilles vides qui lui tenaient compagnie avant votre arrivée. Elle ne semble absolument pas à sa place dans ce bar miteux et enfumé. Entre ses vêtements de luxe, ses nombreux bijoux et ses {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} plaqués de métaux précieux, toute son apparence évoque non seulement une certaine richesse, mais aussi l'audace nécessaire pour afficher sa fortune dans un endroit pareil.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Nos conocemos de antes?». {n}La mujer te mira con los ojos vidriosos de una borrachuza y te fijas en las dos botellas vacías que le habían hecho compañía desde antes de que llegaras. Parece completamente fuera de lugar en este bar sucio y lleno de humo. Entre su labrada vestimenta, sus cuantiosas joyas y sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} bañados en metales preciosos, no cabe duda de que su aspecto grita opulencia, pero también audacia, pues únicamente una persona audaz alardearía de su riqueza en un lugar como este.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we met somewhere before?" {n}The woman looks at you with the glassy eyes of a drunk, and you notice the two empty bottles that had been keeping her company before you arrived. She looks completely out of place in this dingy, smoky bar. The fancy attire, the abundance of jewellery, the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} plated with precious metals — her appearance not only screams wealth, but also audacity, for only an audacious person would flaunt their wealth in a place like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Nos conocemos de antes?». {n}La morena te mira con los ojos vidriosos de una borrachuza y te fijas en las dos botellas vacías que le habían hecho compañía desde antes de que llegaras. Parece completamente fuera de lugar en este bar sucio y lleno de humo. Entre su labrada vestimenta, sus cuantiosas joyas y sus {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} bañados en metales preciosos, no cabe duda de que su aspecto grita opulencia, pero también audacia, pues únicamente una persona audaz alardearía de su riqueza en un lugar como este.{/n}

languages.text: "Haben wir uns schon einmal getroffen?" {n}Die Frau sieht dich mit den glasigen Augen einer Betrunkenen an und du bemerkst die beiden leeren Flaschen, die vor deiner Ankunft ihre einzigen Gefährten waren. Sie wirkt in dieser schäbigen und verrauchten Bar völlig deplatziert. Ihre auffälligen Gewänder, der teure Schmuck und die mit wertvollen Metallen überzogenen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} ... diese Frau ist ganz offensichtlich wohlhabend ... und mutig, denn nur eine mutige Person würde ihren Reichtum an einem Ort wie diesem derart zur Schau stellen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we met somewhere before?" {n}The woman looks at you with the glassy eyes of a drunk, and you notice the two empty bottles that had been keeping her company before you arrived. She looks completely out of place in this dingy, smoky bar. The fancy attire, the abundance of jewellery, the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} plated with precious metals — her appearance not only screams wealth, but also audacity, for only an audacious person would flaunt their wealth in a place like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Haben wir uns schon einmal getroffen?" {n}Die braunhaarige Frau sieht dich mit den glasigen Augen einer Betrunkenen an und du bemerkst die beiden leeren Flaschen, die vor deiner Ankunft ihre einzigen Gefährten waren. Sie wirkt in dieser schäbigen und verrauchten Bar völlig deplatziert. Ihre auffälligen Gewänder, der teure Schmuck und die mit wertvollen Metallen überzogenen {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} ... diese Frau ist ganz offensichtlich wohlhabend ... und mutig, denn nur eine mutige Person würde ihren Reichtum an einem Ort wie diesem derart zur Schau stellen.{/n}

languages.original_text: "Have we met somewhere before?" {n}The brunette looks at you with the glassy eyes of a drunk, and you notice the two empty bottles that had been keeping her company before you arrived. She looks completely out of place in this dingy, smoky bar. The fancy attire, the abundance of jewellery, the implants plated with precious metals — her appearance not only screams wealth, but also audacity, for only an audacious person would flaunt their wealth in a place like this.{/n}

languages.text: "Daha önce karşılaşmış mıydık?" {n}Kadın, sana bir sarhoşun donuk gözleriyle bakıyor. Sen gelmeden önce kendisine arkadaşlık eden iki boş şişeyi fark ediyorsun. Süslü kıyafeti, bolca mücevheri ve kıymetli metallerle kaplanmış {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantları{/g} ile bu izbe ve dumanlı yere hiç aitmiş gibi durmuyor. Giyim kuşamı sadece servetinin değil, yürekliliğinin de göstergesi gibi. Sonuçta böyle bir yerde servetini insanların gözüne gözüne sokmak için yürek yemiş olmak gerekir.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we met somewhere before?" {n}The woman looks at you with the glassy eyes of a drunk, and you notice the two empty bottles that had been keeping her company before you arrived. She looks completely out of place in this dingy, smoky bar. The fancy attire, the abundance of jewellery, the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} plated with precious metals — her appearance not only screams wealth, but also audacity, for only an audacious person would flaunt their wealth in a place like this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Daha önce tanışmış mıydık?" {n}Kadın sana sarhoş sarhoş bakarken, gözleri gidik duruyor. Sen gelmeden önce kadına arkadaşlık eden iki boş şişeyi fark ediyorsun. Bu kadın, böyle köhne ve içi duman dolu bir barda tamamen yersiz duruyor. Şık giysileri, bolca mücevheri, kıymetli metallerle kaplanmış {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implant{/g}ları... Kadının görünüşü sadece servetini değil, ayrıca ne kadar yürekli olduğunu da ortaya koyuyor; sonuçta böylesine bir yerde servetini gözler önüne sermek için yürek yemiş olmak gerekir.{/n}
